page.title: 13WILLINGTON VILLAGE NEWS
page.content: WILLINGTON VILLAGE NEWS IT WAS FIRST PUBLISHED IN APRIL 1979 TO PROVIDE VILLAGERS WITH INFORMATION ON LOCAL EVENTS,REPORTS ON THE ACTIVITIES OF VILLAGE ORGANISATIONS,AS WELL AS REGULAR COLUMNS FROM OUR VICAR AND METHODIST MINISTER. THE MAGAZINE IS PUBLISHED ON THE FIRST IF EVERY MONTH AND CONTAINS AROUND 16 PAGES,BEING PRODUCED BY VILLAGE PEOPLE ON A VOLUNTARY BASIS. WE RELY ON CONTRIBUTIONS FROM ORGANISERS OF CLUB ETC. BEING RECEIVED BY THE 16TH OF THE MONTH PREVIOUSLY.ITEMS MAY BE RECIPES,OLD VILLAGE LIFE, LETTERS FROM FORMER RESIDENTS. THE"BEDFORDSHIRE TIMES" HAS A LOCAL CORRESPONDENT SENDING VILLAGE NEWS TO A WIDER READERSHIP.
